job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongCompany DescriptionstrongppAt Revalize we build the software and technology that powers sales of manufactured complex products Our customers rely on our software to select and sell everything from commercial ovens to specialized pumps and valves to grain elevators and more We are the global leader in sectorspecific software solutions that help manufacturers optimize revenue operations through design applications engineering simulations product selection CPQ PIM visualization and data analyticsppbrppHeadquartered in Jacksonville FL we serve over 8000 customers across the globeppRevalize is a portfolio company of TA AssociatesppbrppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppAre you an experienced software developer who is looking for a new opportunity with a stable growing company Would you love an opportunity to work as part of a collaborative team who values excellent customer service and a strong work ethic This innovative software company is looking for a Programmer who will develop and maintain applications by evaluating clients needs This is a fulltime position with excellent benefits located in Jacksonville FloridappbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpp Identify and analyze technical requirementspp Assist in establishing design standards design patterns and best practices and follow thempp Develop and maintain high quality applicationspp Create and maintain unit tests in order to ensure quality of codepp Answer questions for our Customer Support and Product Management teamsppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongppstrongRequired skills and abilitiesstrongpp 4 years of experience with Javapp 2 years of experience with APIspp 1 years of experience with SpringppnbspppstrongDesired skills that would make you an outstanding candidatestrongpp Mechanical Engineering backgroundpp Experience with ERP andor CRM integrationspp Experience with Angular or Reactpp Experience with SQL Server or PostgeSQLppnbspppstrongEducationstrongpp Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or equivalentppbrppstrongAdditional InformationstrongppAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines If qualified to complete your application you will be required to complete a behavioral and aptitude test to be sent out via emailp
